acercade.detalle: I'm systems engineer and I am focused in software development. I have more than four years of experience in programming and databases managing different technologies like Angular.js, JAVA, Delphi 2007 and PL/SQL. I consider myself an adaptable person and flexible to technology changes. I'm recursive and self-thought.

caracter.item1: I'm disciplined, autonomous and I learn easily.
caracter.item2: I can adapt easily to new technologies.
caracter.item4: I'm multifaceted and I like learning languages.

forma1.titulo: Web Component Development with Servlets and JSPs Java EE 6

forma2.lugar: University corporation School of arts and letters (Bogota, Colombia)

expe1.tecnologias: Angular.js, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, GIT

funciones.func1: Development with JavaScript based in the frameworks Angujar.js and JQuery.
funciones.func2: Design of one part of interface in HTML, CSS3 and JavaScript.
funciones.func3: Consuming RESTful web services in Java.

funciones.func2: Conception and development of procedures PL/SQL in Oracle 10G
funciones.func3: Documentation and implementation of technical solutions.

funciones.fungral: Development, documentation and implementation of Evolution

funciones.func3: Conception and development of procedures in transact-SQL with SQL Server 2005 according to client's requirements

funciones.func3: Documentation and implementation of technical solutions.

expe5.tecnologias: Delphi 2007, JBuilder, Java, Oracle 10g, SQL Server 2005 MS Excel

funciones.fungral: Conception and development of a part of the system Quarterly accounts in DANE and the system of Human Resources in COOPAVA.

funciones.func3: Development of procedures in PL/SQL (Oracle 10g) and SQL Server 2005
funciones.func4: Modeling using UML and documentation for technical solutions implementation.
